summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account transactions of Jeffrey Epstein from March 1, 2016, to March 31, 2016. It includes various debits and credits, including transfers to other banks and checks written, highlighting Epstein's financial activities during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in the financial statement, showing his transactions and account balance.

persons.name: Tonja Haddad
persons.context: Tonja Haddad is mentioned as the beneficiary of a trust account to which Epstein transferred funds.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Larry Visoski is mentioned as a recipient of a transfer from Epstein's account.

persons.name: Ard Beskardes
persons.context: Ard Beskardes is referenced as an attorney who received a transfer from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Epstein transferred funds to Tonja Haddad's trust account.
Epstein made a transfer to Larry Visoski's account.
Epstein transferred funds to Ard Beskardes, who is identified as his attorney.

events.title: Account Activity Begins
events.description: The financial statement begins with the account balance and transactions starting from March 1, 2016.

events.title: Account Activity Ends
events.description: The financial statement concludes with the account balance as of March 31, 2016.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtr, B3, Saint Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details financial transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank from March 1, 2016, to March 31, 2016.
Epstein's account had a beginning balance of $2,436,794.41 and ended with a balance of $0.00.
Significant outgoing transfers included payments to Tonja Haddad's trust account and to attorney Ard Beskardes.
Multiple checks and preauthorized debits were processed during the statement period.
The document includes references to various financial institutions involved in transactions with Epstein.
